subject: Baseball
Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: A federal judge denied a motion to unseal the original version of a search warrant affidavit in which several major league baseball players were implicated in the use of performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: A federal judge denied a motion to unseal the original version of a search warrant affidavit in which several major league baseball players were implicated in the use of performance-enhancing drugs.
